task.title: Using Third Party dialer applications on an iOS device
task.shortdesc: HCL Connections Chat for iOS has the ability to place calls using the Siemens OpenScape Mobile client.

context.p: This feature requires that your company install the Siemens OpenScape UC server and that you have properly installed and configured the OpenScape Mobile client on your device.
To configure dialing for the OpenScape Mobile client, perform the following procedure:

step.cmd: On the iPhone, select the Settings button on the bottom right. On the iPad, tap the gear icon. Select Voice and Video on an iPad, or Connections Voice Chat on an iPhone.
Choose one of the following options under Method for Placing Calls.

info.note: Your system administrator may choose to disable third party dialing.

row.entry: You are always prompted to choose a method when dialing.
Calls are always placed using SametimeÂ® Unified Telephony.
Calls are always placed using the OpenScape Mobile dialer.
Calls are always placed using the cell phone.

info.note: These options are not available if you do not have the proper functionality on your device; for example, an iPad with no data plan doesn't have the iPhone option.
